setting.name: CLEAR_CACHE_FLAG
setting.description: If true, the screen shot cache will be cleared after every post. This must be false only when debugging.

setting.name: CREATURE_MAXSPEED
setting.description: Maximum speed of a creature.

setting.name: DATA_TEMPERATURE
setting.description: The current temperature. This is set at runtime, but you can specify a default value.

setting.name: CELLB_ALPHA
setting.description: Range between 0f and 1f. The alpha component of the soft cells color.

setting.name: DATA_HUMIDITY
setting.description: The current relative humidity. This is set at runtime, but you can specify a default value.

setting.name: CELLA_ALPHA
setting.description: Range between 0f and 1f. The alpha component of the hard cells color.

setting.name: CELLB_ALPHA_VARIATION
setting.description: Range between 0f and 1f. The amount the soft cells alpha value is allowed to vary. 1f : from CELLB_ALPHA to 0, 0f: disabled, values in between: CELLB_ALPHA to CELLB_ALPHA*CELLB_ALPHA_VARIATION.

setting.name: CELLA_RADIUS
setting.description: The maximum radius of hard cells, that is to say the radiu of the seed.

setting.name: CELLA_TEXTURE
setting.description: The name of the image used as texture for the hard cells.

setting.name: CREATURE_ALPHA
setting.description: Range between 0f and 1f. The alpha component of the creature color.

setting.name: FOOD_SCENT_EVAPORATION
setting.description: How fast the creatures pheromones evaporate.

setting.name: CREATURE_DIM_THRESHOLD
setting.description: When the number of creatures reach this threshold, their alpha is divided by 2.

setting.name: FOOD_R
setting.description: Range between 0f and 1f. The red component of the food color.

setting.name: CELLB_RADIUS
setting.description: The maximum radius of the soft cells.

setting.name: CELLA_MASK
setting.description: The name of the image used as a mask for the hard cells.

setting.name: CELLB_MAX_DISTANCE_TO_A
setting.description: Defines the maximum distance between a softcell and a hard cell when the softcell is created.

setting.name: LOCATION_CITY
setting.description: City where Mimodek is running.

setting.name: LOCATION_COUNTRY
setting.description: Country where Mimodek is running.

setting.name: GLOBAL_SCALING
setting.description: Useful to magnify/shrink the image, leave to 1 when Mimodek is on display

setting.name: FOOD_G
setting.description: Range between 0f and 1f. The green component of the food color.

setting.name: CREATURE_STEER_FORCE
setting.description: Controls how sharp the creatures turn.

setting.name: CREATURE_R
setting.description: Range between 0f and 1f. The red component of the creatures color.

setting.name: FOOD_B
setting.description: Range between 0f and 1f. The blue component of the food color.

setting.name: DATA_POLLUTION
setting.description: The current air quality score. This is set at runtime, but you can specify a default value.

setting.name: GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER
setting.description: Define the texture filtering. Might or might not do anything depending on the hardware

setting.name: GALLERY_FOLDER
setting.description: Path to the folder on SFTP_HOST where screen shots will be delivered.

setting.name: MESSAGE_BOARD_FREQUENCY
setting.description: How often should the board be shown in minutes. O disables message board.

setting.name: CREATURE_G
setting.description: Range between 0f and 1f. The green component of the creatures color.

setting.name: MESSAGE_BOARD_FADE_SPEED
setting.description: How fast the board fades in / out.

setting.name: MESSAGE_BOARD_TEXTURE
setting.description: The name of the image to use as a board

setting.name: POST_PICTURES_FLAG
setting.description: If true, a screen shot of Mimodek will be posted to the blog every UPLOAD_RATE minutes.

setting.name: MESSAGE_BOARD_NUMBER
setting.description: How many images to show.

setting.name: CELLA_MAX_TRY
setting.description: How many times the organism should try to find space for a new hardcell. High values might stop the animation alltogether

setting.name: CREATURE_B
setting.description: Range between 0f and 1f. The blue component of the creatures color.

setting.name: CREATURE_FULL_R
setting.description: Range between 0f and 1f. The red component of the creatures color when it is bringing food to the organism.

setting.name: CELLA_DISTORTION
setting.description: Range between 0f and 1f. Controls the distortion of the circle that makes the shape of the hard cells.

setting.name: CELLA_DISTANCE_BETWEEN
setting.description: Range between 0f and 1f. Controls of far appart the hard cells should be of each others. 0f means that they all share the same center, 1f and the distance between them is the sum of their radius.

setting.name: UPLOAD_RATE
setting.description: Frequency of screen shot post in minutes.

setting.name: CELLB_TEXTURE
setting.description: The name of the image used as texture for the soft cells.

setting.name: CREATURE_SIZE
setting.description: The diameter of a creature.

setting.name: HIGH_RESOLUTION_SCALE
setting.description: Define the scaling factor for high resolution rendering.

setting.name: DEBUG
setting.description: Toggle debug message.

setting.name: CREATURE_FULL_G
setting.description: Range between 0f and 1f. The green component of the creatures color when it is bringing food to the organism.

setting.name: CREATURE_FULL_B
setting.description: Range between 0f and 1f. The blue component of the creatures color when it is bringing food to the organism.

setting.name: CELLB_R
setting.description: Range between 0f and 1f. The red component of the soft cells color.

setting.name: UPLOAD_FORMAT
setting.description: Extension of the image format used for automatic posting. WARNING: Because Mimodek is currently using Exif metadata, only jpg is allowed, any other value is untested and will most certainly cause problems.

setting.name: CELLB_MASK
setting.description: The name of the image used as a mask for the soft cells.

setting.name: SFTP_HOST
setting.description: Host name of the ftp server.

setting.name: CREATURE_ALPHA_VARIATION
setting.description: Range between 0f and 1f. The amount the soft cells alpha value is allowed to vary. 1f : from CREATURE_ALPHA to 0, 0f: disabled, values in between: CREATURE_ALPHA to CREATURE_ALPHA*CREATURE_ALPHA_VARIATION.

setting.name: CELLA_R
setting.description: Range between 0f and 1f. The red component of the hard cells color.

setting.name: CELLB_G
setting.description: Range between 0f and 1f. The green component of the soft cells color.

setting.name: FOOD_SIZE
setting.description: Size of a piece of food.

setting.name: CELLB_MIN_DISTANCE_TO_A
setting.description: Defines the minimum distance between a softcell and a hard cell when the softcell is created.

setting.name: CELLB_B
setting.description: Range between 0f and 1f. The blue component of the soft cells color.

setting.name: WORDPRESS_URL
setting.description: URL of the blog.

setting.name: CELLA_G
setting.description: Range between 0f and 1f. The green component of the hard cells color.

setting.name: MESSAGE_BOARD_DURATION
setting.description: How long should the board be shown. In minutes.

setting.name: CREATURE_DISTANCE_BETWEEN
setting.description: The distance creatures try to keep between each others.

setting.name: CELLA_B
setting.description: Range between 0f and 1f. The blue component of the hard cells color.

setting.name: DATA_REFRESH_RATE
setting.description: Frequency of data query in minutes.
